lexUnit.name: bend.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: incline the body downwards; stoop.

sentence.text: The boy bent double and disappeared inside the hide .
One of Dana 's reactions was very characteristic : he bent double with laughter at something he had said that made all the others laugh , too .
He bent low to examine his prisoner 's face even more closely .
He bent forward to put his arms around me .
Reluctantly , he pushed the money across the table towards her , then bent forward to listen .
I walked back , bent over him , and kissed his cheek .
As we bent over him , he opened his eyes and groaned .
Kate bent over Nicandra to pick up the tray : ` And you did n't eat the half of it , " she said reproachfully .
He came closer and bent towards my ear .
` I 'm not sure I approve of the way you were looking at that visitor , " he went on , bending towards her and speaking quietly .
And he bent towards her and extracted a kiss from her reluctant lips the way he might have taken the pit from an apricot .
Lisa bent towards him .
He bent to the howling child .
" She bent to mouth into her sister 's ear .
Pepita bent back down to her work and checked off another crate of bananas that would be shipped to lands she had never seen and would never see .
Close your eyes , inhale and bend back as far as you can ( without any discomfort ) thrusting your arms back .
She bent down and took a grip of either side of a crate to steady herself .
Quietly he bent down and spoke : ` Take my advice , boy , get up , fuck off , and when you get outside -- drop dead . "
She was trembling as she bent down and inserted it carefully into the left-hand drawer of the desk .
The medal was handed to her on a velvet cushion and she bent down and hung it on a little hook with which we had each been provided on arrival .
She bent over and kissed me gently on the cheek .
Sladen bent carefully back in his chair and frowned at the ceiling .
The Florentine lace cover was rumpled and she walked over and bent down to straighten it .
He bent down to his briefcase which he 'd left on the floor , took out a folder , turned back the pages , and handed it to her .
He bent down towards Len now and pulled a face at him .
Taking a chair , he set the camera up in the yard outside , bending over for a moment to fiddle with it .
The vaguely fluttering nerves suddenly crystallised themselves into a hard painful little knot in her stomach and she bent over with a groan .
As she bent up from the oven , up out of the kitchen , a shaft of watery sun manifested itself on the floor like a dim splash of paint .
I was wearing a large theatrical ring with an enormous ` emerald " surrounded by paste diamonds and he bent more closely to look at it .
Lily at once bent nearer .
He bent and kissed her lips .
The girl bent to stroke one of the cats , murmuring to it , and from somewhere behind the hall came the cooing of doves .
